snippet: House Speaker John Boehner says the United States may have "no choice" but to send American troops to fight Islamic State group militants if President Barack Obama's strategy fails to destroy the extremist group....

headline.print_headline: Boehner: US May Need Ground Troops vs. Militants
headline.main: Boehner: US May Need Ground Troops vs. Militants

lead_paragraph: House Speaker John Boehner says the United States may have "no choice" but to send American troops to fight Islamic State group militants if President Barack Obama's strategy fails to destroy the extremist group.
